user.title: Set up Legrand Smarther
user.description: Set up your Legrand Smarther thermostats using OAuth2 authentication. You need to have application credentials configured first.

pick_implementation.title: Choose authentication method
pick_implementation.description: Select the authentication provider to use for Legrand Smarther.

auth.title: Authenticate with Legrand
auth.description: Click the link below to authenticate with your Legrand developer account. You will be redirected to Legrand's website to complete the authentication process.

select_modules.title: Select thermostats
select_modules.description: Choose which thermostats you want to add to Home Assistant. Each thermostat will be set up as a separate device with climate, temperature, and humidity sensors.

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate with Legrand
reauth_confirm.description: Your authentication has expired. Please re-authenticate to continue using your Legrand Smarther devices. Your device settings will be preserved.

error.no_application_credentials: No application credentials configured. Please set up application credentials for Legrand Smarther first. See the documentation for setup instructions.
error.auth_error: Authentication failed. Please check your credentials and try again. Make sure your Legrand developer account has the required permissions.
error.no_plants: No plants found in your Legrand account. Please check your account and ensure you have thermostats configured in the Legrand app.
error.no_modules: No compatible thermostats found. Please ensure you have Smarther v2 devices configured in your plants.
error.no_modules_selected: Please select at least one thermostat to add to Home Assistant.
error.already_configured: All selected thermostats are already configured in Home Assistant.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred during setup. Please try again or check the logs for more details.

abort.already_configured: This device is already configured in Home Assistant
abort.no_implementation: No authentication implementation available. Please configure application credentials first.
abort.no_plants: No plants found in your Legrand account
abort.no_modules: No compatible Smarther v2 thermostats found

init.title: Configure Legrand Smarther options
init.description: Configure polling interval and sensor options for your Legrand Smarther devices.

data.enable_extra_sensors: Enable additional diagnostic sensors (setpoint, last update, heating/cooling state)

data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll the Legrand API for updates. Lower values provide more responsive updates but may impact API rate limits.
data_description.temperature_step: The increment used when adjusting temperature setpoints in the UI.
data_description.enable_extra_sensors: Creates additional sensors for diagnostics and monitoring beyond the basic temperature and humidity sensors.

auth_error.message: Authentication failed. Please re-authenticate in the integration settings.

api_error_469.message: Your Thermostat app password has expired. Please renew it in the official Legrand Thermostat app and try again.

api_error_470.message: Terms and conditions have expired. Please accept them again in the official Legrand Thermostat app.

connection_error.message: Unable to connect to Legrand servers. Please check your internet connection and try again.

timeout_error.message: Request timed out. The Legrand servers may be temporarily unavailable. Please try again in a few moments.

not_found_error.message: Thermostat is offline or not found. Check that your device is connected to the network and configured properly.
